body_content.explanation: to form a picture of someone or something in your mind, in order to imagine or remember them:
examples: I was so surprised when he turned up - I'd visualized someone much older.
Write down your goals and visualise yourself achieving them.
Sometimes you can visualize what you want to do but you just can't do it.

body_content.explanation: to make something able to be seen:
examples: An echocardiogram can accurately visualise the motion of the heart's walls.
Enzyme activity was visualized as a yellowish staining on a green background.
